lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia, out with a broken foot, took grounders while on his knees during Red Sox batting practice.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia, out with a broken foot, took grounders while on his knees during Red Sox batting practice.

headline.main: With a Broken Foot, Pedroia Fields From His Knees
headline.seo: Pedroia Fields From Knees During Red Sox’ Batting Practice
headline.print_headline: With a Broken Foot, Pedroia Fields From His Knees
